description:
cmd/cgo, cmd/ld: new cgo object file section

Switch to new pragma names, but leave old ones available for now.
Merge the three cgo-related sections in the .6 files into a single
cgo section.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

https://codereview.appspot.com/7424048/diff/11001/src/cmd/5c/swt.c
File src/cmd/5c/swt.c (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7424048/diff/11001/src/cmd/5c/swt.c#newcode397
src/cmd/5c/swt.c:397: Bprint(&b, "\n");
References to b should be outbuf instead.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=938d3b46b933 ***

cmd/cgo, cmd/ld: new cgo object file section

Switch to new pragma names, but leave old ones available for now.
Merge the three cgo-related sections in the .6 files into a single
cgo section.

R=golang-dev, iant, ality
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7424048

subject: code review 7424048: cmd/cgo, cmd/ld: new cgo object file section
